entry.title: Meeting Summary
entry.summary: We had a quick meeting today, and briefly revisited the picnic, tutoring, the Farmer's market, the robot, and posters. We finally got our robot back, so next week, we will be rebuilding our robots at Skyline!

entry.title: Meeting Summary: Tying up loose ends
entry.summary: We decided on the time and date of the farmer's market (June 29th), the approximate date of the picnic, and resolved to create a more detailed inventory of our parts so we can revive the robots more efficently. We also discussed recruiting middle-schoolers, creating posters, and reviewed progress on the website.

entry.title: Meeting this Thursday
entry.summary: We're having a meeting this Thursday, in Mrs. Shim's room. We'll be discussing the specifics of the picnic and the farmer's market, reviving the robot, and possibly mentoring and recuiting.
